Title: toIntervalQuarter
Description: Returns an interval of n quarters of data type IntervalQuarter.
n — Number of quarters. Integer numbers or string representations thereof, and float numbers. (U)Int*/Float*/String.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-06-15') AS date,    toIntervalQuarter(1) AS interval_to_quarterSELECT date + interval_to_quarter AS result
